AppenderInfo.AppenderDesc: This appender will buffer 100 messages before delivering them to the specified appender.

Argument.Name: BufferSize
Argument.Description: Buffer how many messages before delivering them to the indicated appender

Argument.Name: evaluator
Argument.Description: If a LevelEvaluator is specified with a threshold. This means that the events will only be delivered when a message with level of threshold or higher level is logged.

Argument.Name: Threshold
Argument.Description: If a LevelEvaluator is specified with a threshold. This means that the events will only be delivered when a message with level of threshold or higher level is logged.
